title: 1 of the ways to get trolled by your support
body: A Morgana on Red side throws a stun out at a full hp Lucian whilst 3 quarters way down in between primary bot lane towers, vsing an Xerath support with the potential to be ganked by a Jarvan and tells you it was to poke him. Wattahead!!!!

replies.body: happens? Give 20s early warnings and tell people to check mia before crossing the road and creep aggro + mislead skillshots into missing
It's simple as not use abilities when not necessary.

> [{quoted}](name=C Banger ,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=i94BVRmB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-11-07T04:07:41.526+0000)
>
> It's simple as not use abilities when not necessary.

Morg Q is long enough ta be safe dough unless she was doing it weird
